ARABIC: وَلَا تَلْبِسُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ بِٱلْبَٰطِلِ وَتَكْتُمُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not mix up truth with falsehood and knowingly hide the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not confuse truth with falsehood, nor conceal the truth knowingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Confound not the Truth with falsehood nor conceal it knowingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not mix truth with falsehood and do not deliberately hide the truth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And do not mix the truth with falsehood, nor purposely conceal the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And mix not truth with falsehood, nor conceal the truth while you know (the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And do not mix up the truth with the falsehood, nor hide the truth while you know (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And do not confound the truth with vanity, and do not conceal the truth wittingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Confound not truth with falsehood, nor knowingly conceal the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not mix truth with falsehood, or hide the truth when you know it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And confound not the truth with falsehood, nor hide the truth while ye know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not mix the truth with falsehood, nor conceal the truth while you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And cover not Truth with falsehood, nor conceal the Truth when ye know (what it is).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And mix not truth with falsehood, nor conceal the truth [i.e. Muhammad Peace be upon him is Allah's Messenger and his qualities are written in your Scriptures, the Taurat (Torah) and the Injeel (Gospel)] while you know (the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not confound truth with falsehood, nor knowingly hide the truth while you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And do not mix truth with falsehood, and do not conceal the truth while you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And do not mix the truth with falsehood or conceal the truth while you know [it].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:42] And do not obscure, confuse, the truth, that I have revealed to you, with falsehood, that you fabricate; and do not conceal the truth, the description of Muhammad (s), wittingly, that is, knowing it to be the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Confound not truth with falsehood), do not mix the Truth with falsehood, i.e. the description of the anti- Christ with the description of Muhammad (pbuh) (nor knowingly conceal the Truth), nor conceal the Truth while you know what is the Truth.
